attributes.action: Remove the BBC's licence and until they support themselves by commercilisation
attributes.additional_details: £3m paid for mugs and magnets for marketing... removing free licences etc...
attributes.background: Pilots with great responsibility and surgeons don't earn this amount of money let alone paramedics who are first line response and save lives. All our licence fee money for repeats, hot air and button pushing script reading music playing. It's a disgrace and the BBC's licence should be removed
